channel.title: The walking dead - 360
channel.description:
Who has played it and what are your thoughts?
I REALLY liked how the story is altered by the decisions you make. To me it was intense as hell.
IGN:8.5 POLYGON:9
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N40uY51s5Z0

item.title: The walking dead - 360
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

I guess its just not for some people. It’s best if you try to get into rather then just playing. At least you tried it

Read full topic

item.title: The walking dead - 360
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:7, topic:509038”]Alright, so I’ve played this a bit and here is my: Boring.

Alright plot, but it gets so repetitive.[/quote]
You just gotta get into the story, and it’s not really all too repetitive, IMO at least.

Read full topic

item.title: The walking dead - 360
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:509038”][quote author=jal knight link=topic=627278.msg4272478#msg4272478 date=1364653468]

You’re the one who told me about it Brian, but it’s amazing. I’m on episode 4 right now, it’s really suspenseful, you can NEVER guess what happens next, even if you do, you’re wrong.

Little boy die yet?
[/quote]
Yeah, I shot him. Kenny is still pretty torn up.[/quote]
Get used to it, he’ll be fked until the very end. Something big is about to happen to you and depending upon how you treated other people will they offer their help

Read full topic
